identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Digital Verandah' - warm, safe, and human.
core_principles: No Generic 'Dating App' Vibes - It's a companionship marketplace.
Softness Over Sexiness - Use pastels, rounded corners, and warm tones.
Safety First - Visual cues of trust (shields, verified badges) are central.
Native First - Touch targets must be 48px+. Animations must be 60fps.

accent.description: Marigold - Indian context, festive but subtle.

layout_strategy.bottom_nav: Height 60-80px, floating effect or solid warm background

Button.base: flex-row items-center justify-center rounded-full px-6 py-4 active:opacity-90

Card.base: bg-white rounded-2xl p-4 shadow-sm border border-stone-100

Input.base: bg-white border border-stone-200 rounded-xl px-4 py-3 text-stone-800 focus:border-[#FF8FA3]
Input.label: text-sm font-semibold text-stone-600 mb-1

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP NATIVEWIND: Since this is a React Native project, you MUST set up NativeWind if not present. Run 'npm install nativewind tailwindcss' and configure 'tailwind.config.js'.
2. SETUP FONTS: Use 'expo-font' to load Nunito (Headings) and Mulish (Body). Do not use system fonts.
3. NAVIGATION: Use 'expo-router'. Create a file-based routing structure.
4. MOCKED FLOWS: Implement dummy logic for OTP (any 4 digits work), Voice Call (simulate connection + timer), and Payments (simulate success).
5. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (Button, TouchableOpacity, TextInput) MUST have a 'testID' prop (React Native uses testID, not data-testid). Format: 'screen-element-action'.
6. STYLING: Use 'className' prop for styling. Example: <View className='flex-1 bg-[#FFFBF0]'>.
7. SAFETY CUES: Always display a 'Shield' icon or 'Verified' badge on Listener profiles.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to use 'Inter' font. STOP. Use 'Nunito' for this friendly app.
Do not use dark mode by default. Tier 2/3 users often prefer high-contrast light modes.
Avoid 'Gradient Overload'. Use solid pastel backgrounds.
For 'Talk Now', use a pulsing animation (scale 1 -> 1.1 -> 1) using react-native-reanimated.
